title._content: [Portrait of Tiny Grimes, New York, N.Y.(?), ca. Jan. 1947] (LOC)

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Tiny Grimes, New York, N.Y.(?), ca. Jan. 1947] 1 negative : b&w ; 2 1/4 x 2 1/4 in. Caption from Down Beat: Bumped into trumpeter Herman Grimes, who was on way to join Ellington's ork Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 538 Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: "Posin'," Down Beat, v. 16, no. 3 (Jan. 29, 1947), p. 2. Subjects: Grimes, Tiny, 1917- Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Guitarists--1940-1950. Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig... Repository: (negative) Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print Part Of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (DLC) 99-401005 General information about the Gottlieb Collection is available at lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-home.html Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.music/gottlieb.12231 Call Number: LC-GLB23- 1223
